title: What California’s Landmark Climate Legislation Means for Communities of Color (The Greenlining Institute)
text: ( Source : The Greenlining Institute ) Today Governor Brown signed into law the Clean Energy and Pollution Reduction Act of 2015 , also known as SB 350. This landmark bill sets transformative targets and policies that will get California to 50
